snippet: The writer Chad Beguelin is largely known for lighter fare, so his domestic comedy “Harbor” offers a chance to see another side of him.
lead_paragraph: The writer Chad Beguelin is largely known for lighter fare, so his domestic comedy “Harbor” offers a chance to see another side of him.

headline.main: Life Was Idyllic, Then Sis Arrived
headline.print_headline: Life Was Idyllic, Then Sis Arrived
